Class Rule

Namespace
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.Models
Assembly
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.dll

Represents a business rule for automated article processing. Supports complex conditions, multiple actions, and scope-based filtering.

[Table("Rules")]
public class Rule
Inheritance
object
Rule
Inherited Members
object.Equals(object)
object.Equals(object, object)

object.ToString()

Remarks

Rules define automated actions to be performed when articles match specific conditions. Each rule includes:

  • Conditions: Define what articles trigger the rule
  • Scope: Restrict which feeds/categories the rule applies to
  • Actions: What to do when conditions are met (notify, tag, mark read, etc.)
  • Configuration: Priority, enabled status, execution order

Rules can be simple (single condition) or complex (multiple conditions with AND/OR logic) using the UsesAdvancedConditions flag and Conditions collection.

Performance optimizations:

  • JSON fields store arrays of IDs efficiently
  • Indexed on IsEnabled and Priority for fast active rule retrieval
  • MatchCount and LastMatchDate for analytics without separate tables
